name: seamanly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
like a good seaman (= sailor): After sailing with him, I have the greatest respect for his seamanly qualities. He always made sure that everything was done in a proper seamanly manner.
More examplesFewer examplesThe seamanly thing to do would be to pull up the anchor and leave.A captain who threw his cargo overboard would not be a seamanly fellow. We need to allow time for a seamanly appraisal of the situation.They completed the job in true seamanly fashion.
